item.title: sadie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: sadie add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: sadie add a quote by Andrew Wolfe
item.description: "A book without words is like love without a kiss; it's empty." -- Andrew Wolfe

item.title: sadie add a quote by Milan Kundera
item.description: "Two people in love, alone, isolated from the world, that's beautiful." -- Milan Kundera

item.title: sadie add a quote by E. E. Cummings
item.description: "Unbeing dead isn't being alive." -- E. E. Cummings

item.title: sadie add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: sadie add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life." -- Albert Camus

item.title: sadie add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "He who controls the past controls the future. He who controls the present controls the past." -- George Orwell

item.title: sadie add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "The most effective way to destroy people is to deny and obliterate their own understanding of their history." -- George Orwell

item.title: sadie add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength." -- George Orwell

item.title: sadie add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: sadie add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: sadie add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: sadie add a quote by Marilyn Monroe
item.description: "I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best." -- Marilyn Monroe

item.title: sadie add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: sadie add a quote by Allen Saunders
item.description: "Life is what happens to you while you're busy making other plans." -- Allen Saunders

item.title: sadie add a quote by Arthur Brisbane
item.description: "A good friend can tell you what is the matter with you in a minute. He may not seem such a good friend after telling. " -- Arthur Brisbane

item.title: sadie add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: sadie add a quote by Dean Koontz
item.description: "Never leave a friend behind. Friends are all we have to get us through this life--and they are the only things from this world that we could hope to see in the next." -- Dean Koontz

item.title: sadie add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: sadie add a quote by Jeanette Winterson
item.description: "The Buddhists say there are 149 ways to God. I'm not looking for God, only for myself, and that is far more complicated. God has had a great deal written about Him; nothing has been written about me. God is bigger, like my mother, easier to find, even in the dark. I could be anywhere, and since I can't describe myself I can't ask for help." -- Jeanette Winterson

item.title: sadie add a quote by Kobayashi Issa
item.description: "What a strange thing! to be alive beneath cherry blossoms." -- Kobayashi Issa

item.title: sadie add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: sadie add a quote by Maya Angelou
item.description: "There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you." -- Maya Angelou

item.title: sadie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Be yourself; everyone else is already taken." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: sadie add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: sadie add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: sadie add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "I think you still love me, but we can’t escape the fact that I’m not enough for you. I knew this was going to happen. So I’m not blaming you for falling in love with another woman. I’m not angry, either. I should be, but I’m not. I just feel pain. A lot of pain. I thought I could imagine how much this would hurt, but I was wrong." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: sadie add a quote by Jodi Picoult
item.description: "If you gave someone your heart and they died, did they take it with them? Did you spend the rest of forever with a hole inside you that couldn't be filled?" -- Jodi Picoult
